html.problem:
CheckPoint: Mass of the Sun
from __future__ import division from loncapa import *
a=lc_random(1,3,1) b=lc_random(1,3,1) c=lc_random(1,3,1) T1=lc_choose(c,352,374,385) T= T1*24*60*60 aa=lc_choose(b,1.3e11,1.63e11,1.75e11) G=6.67E-11
m=4* math.pi* math.pi* aa* aa* aa/ G/ T/ T
A sloppy astronomer measured the following parameters of the Earth orbital motion around the Sun: the period is $T1 days, and the semi-major axis is $aa m. What is the mass of the Sun according to the astronomer's results? The universal gravitational constant is $G SI units.
\(M_{sun}=\)
